IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: SECURE AND ADMINISTER FUNDS FOR STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE IN THE FORM OF SCHOLARSHIPS AND GRANTS-IN-AID AND FOR GRANTS AND FINANCIAL SUPPORT THAT ADVANCES AND ENRICHES THE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM OF SOUTH PLAINS COLLEGE, LEVELLAND, TEXAS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: SECURE AND ADMINISTER FUNDS FOR STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE IN THE FORM OF SCHOLARSHIPS AND GRANTS-IN-AID AND FOR GRANTS AND FINANCIAL SUPPORT THAT ADVANCES AND ENRICHES THE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM OF SOUTH PLAINS COLLEGE, LEVELLAND, TEXAS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM SUPPORT TO SOUTH PLAINS COLLEGE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS BASED UPON THEIR SCHOLASTIC ACHIEVEMENTS AND/OR FINANCIAL NEEDS IN ACCORDANCE TO CRITERIA DETERMINED BY DONORS AND/OR SOUTH PLAINS COLLEGE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE INTENDED FOR STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS AND GRANTS-IN-AID.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part XI, Line 2d: Other revenue amounts included in F/S but not included on form 990
Part XII, Line 2d: Other expenses and losses per audited F/S
Form 990, Part VI, Line 2: Description of Business or Family Relationship of Officers, Directors, Et
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCOTT WADE-DIRECTOR,EMPLOYED BY AIM BANK, LEVELLAND, TX.PAULA BELL-DIRECTOR,DIRECTOR OF AIM BANK, LEVELLAND, TX.CHAD ALEXANDER-DIRECTOR,DIRECTOR OF AIM BANK, LEVELLAND, TX.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THIRTY DAYS PRIOR TO FILING DEADLINE, A COPY OF COMPLETED FORM 990 SHALL BE MAILED TO ALL DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS FOR REVIEW. DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS HAVE FIFTEEN DAYS TO REVIEW AND SUBMIT QUESTIONS TO AND/OR REQUEST ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FROM THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, IN CONSULTATION WITH THE BOARD PRESIDENT AND TREASURER, SHALL RESPOND TO ALL DIRECTOR INQUIRIES AS SOON AS POSSIBLE BUT PRIOR TO THE FILING DEADLINE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: POLICY REQUIRES EACH DIRECTOR, PRINCIPAL OFFICER AND MEMBER OF A COMMITTEE WITH BOARD DELEGATED POWERS TO ANNUALLY SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT AND DISCLOSE THE EXISTENCE AND NATURE OF FINANCIAL INTEREST OR CONFLICT OF LOYALTY AS DEFINED BY THE POLICY. ANNUAL REVIEWS OF THESE DISCLOSURES ARE CONDUCTED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE TO IDENTIFY ANY INTEREST THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15a: Compensation Review & Approval Process - CEO, Top Management
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SOUTH PLAINS COLLEGE FOUNDATION DOES NOT PROVIDE COMPENSATION FOR ITS DIRECTORS, OFFICERS OR TOP MANAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SOUTH PLAINS COLLEGE FOUNDATION DOES NOT EMPLOY ANY MANAGEMENT OR STAFF PERSONNEL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE FOUNDATION. ADDITIONALLY, THESE DOCUMENTS AND OTHER INFORMATION ARE MADE AVAILABLE ON THE SOUTH PLAINS COLLEGE FOUNDATION WEBSITE AT WWW.SPCTXFOUNDATION.ORG.
